updatedDate.description: the date and time of the last update to the record, in ISO 8601 format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZZ)

createdDate.description: the date and time the record was created, in ISO 8601 format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZZ)

deletedDate.description: the date the record was deleted, in ISO 8601 format (yyyy-MM-dd)

deleted.description: whether the record has been deleted

suppressed.description: whether the record has been suppressed

bibIds.description: the IDs of the bibliographic records to which this item is linked

location.description: the location of the item with the location code and name

status.description: the status of the item, with the code and display value, and a due date if the item is checked out

volumes.description: the links to the volume records associated with this item

barcode.description: the barcode found in the item record

callNumber.description: the call number found in the item record

itemType.description: the type of the item record

transitInfo.description: transit information for the item record

copyNo.description: indicates which copy of the title corresponds to the item record

holdCount.description: the number of holds associated with the item

fixedFields.description: the fixed-length fields from the item record

varFields.description: the variable-length fields from the item record
